title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A 

– Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 5) (Amendment) (No. 2) 
Regulations 2020. 

(2) Subject to paragraph (3), these Regulations shall come into operation 

on the 26th day of September 2020. 

(3) The amendment effected by Regulation (3)(f)(ii), in so far as it relates 

to Regulations 15(3) and 16 of the Principal Regulations, shall come into 
operation on 28th day of September 2020. 

Definition
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (no 5) (amendment) (no 2) regulation 2020 (2) subject paragraph (3) regulation shall come operation 26th day september 2020 (3) amendment effected regulation (3)(f)(ii) far relates regulation 15(3) 16 principal regulation shall come operation 28th day september 2020 definition

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: In these Regulations, “Principal Regulations” means the Health Act
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, “Principal Regulations” means the Health Act 

1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 5) Regulations 
(S.I. No. 352 of 2020). 

Amendment of Principal Regulations

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 3. The Principal Regulations are amended -
text_raw:
3. The Principal Regulations are amended - 

(a) 

in Regulation 9(3) - 

(i) 

in subparagraph (e), by the substitution of “Horse Racing 
Ireland,” for “Horse Racing Ireland, or”, 

(ii) by the insertion of the following subparagraph after 

subparagraph (e): 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th September, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [375] 3 

“(ea) is involved in the training and preparation of 

greyhounds for events held under the authority of 
Bord na gCon, or”, and 

(iii) 

in subparagraph (f), by the substitution of “(a) to (ea)” for 
“(a) to (e)”, 

(b) 

in Regulation 17(2)(b) - 

(i) 

(ii) 

in clause (iv), by the substitution of “Irish Rugby Football 
Union,” for “Irish Rugby Football Union, or”, 

in clause (v), by the substitution of “Horse Racing Ireland, 
or” for “Horse Racing Ireland”, and 

(iii) by the insertion of the following clause after clause (v): 

“(vi) is involved in the training and preparation of 

greyhounds for events held under the authority of 
Bord na gCon.”, 

(c) 

in Regulation 18(3) - 

(i) 

in subparagraph (e), by the substitution of “Horse Racing 
Ireland,” for “Horse Racing Ireland, or”, 

(ii) by the insertion of the following subparagraph after 

subparagraph (e): 

“(ea) is involved in the training and preparation of 

greyhounds for events held under the authority of 
Bord na gCon, or”, and 

(iii) 

in subparagraph (f), by the substitution of “(a) to (ea)” for 
“(a) to (e)”, 

(d) 

in Regulation 19 - 

(i) 

in paragraph (2), by the substitution of the following 
subparagraph for subparagraph (b): 

“(b) the holding of horseracing or greyhound racing at a 

racecourse in accordance with these Regulations, 
or”, and 

(ii) by the insertion of the following paragraph after paragraph 

(3): 

“(3A) Paragraph (3)(d) shall not apply in respect of a 
relevant premises in a relevant county listed in paragraph 
(2) of Schedule 1.”, 

(e) 

in Regulation 20 - 

(i) 

in paragraph (1)(c), by the substitution of “Regulation 
19(3)(d)” for “Regulation 19(3)(b)”, and 

(ii) by the insertion of the following paragraph after paragraph 

(1): 

 
 4 [375] 

“(1A) Paragraph (1)(c) shall not apply in respect of a 
relevant premises in a relevant county listed in paragraph 
(2) of Schedule 1.”, and 

(f) 

in Schedule 1 - 

(i) 

by the designation of the Schedule as paragraph (1), and 

(ii) by the insertion of the following paragraph after paragraph 

(1): 

“(2) The County of Donegal”. 

 
 
 
 
 [375] 5 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

25 September, 2020. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [375]

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 5) Regulations (S.I. No. 352 of 2020) to provide 
for certain temporary restrictions in County Donegal because of Covid-19, and 
for a technical amendment to provide for greyhound racing as a sporting event. 
The Regulations remain in operation until 10 October 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [375] 7 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
